title: Best of The Herd for Mar 10, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Mar 10, 2020
description:
Doug Gottlieb in for Colin

Dak Prescott is taking advantage of a flawed system

Tom Brady might be giving us a sign about where he is planning to sign

Did Kevin Durant get a coach fired and not Kyrie?

Guest: TJ Houshmandzadeh, former Pro Bowl WR

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
